channel.title: Telnet on Alex Pliutau
channel.description: Recent content in Telnet on Alex Pliutau

item.title: Snake over Telnet in Go
item.description: Telnet games were very popular some time ago, especially this Star Wars movie: telnet towel.blinkenlights.nl. I wanted to create something in Go, and I wrote this Snake game over Telnet. Go is awesome in this case, no need any dependencies to build this funny stuff. Development go get github.com/plutov/go-snake-telnet go-snake-telnet --host localhost --port 8080 Contribute It’s open source project, so feel free to contribute - go-snake-telnet.
